price: 18 Sourds, muets, aveugles à la vérité, ils ne peuvent revenir de leur égarement.
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
